conversation.message: I have been following Company_C's work closely and am deeply impressed by your recent innovations. My skills align perfectly with the needs of this organization, and I am highly motivated to contribute to your success. I formally submit my application for consideration.
conversation.thought: As Seeker_E, my primary goal is to match with my highest preferred company. Company_C is my top choice. In the first round, the optimal strategy in a job seeker-proposing system (like the Deferred Acceptance algorithm) is to propose to the most preferred company. Although I anticipate competition (likely from Seeker_D, who also prefers C_C highly, and who C_C ranks higher), I must initiate the proposal now to secure the best possible outcome if Company_C accepts me, or to move down my list efficiently if rejected. I will use the [APPLY] tag to make a formal proposal.
